headline: U.S. Retailers Maximize Week of Black Friday, Leading to Softer Day-Of Traffic
summary: NEUHAUSEN, Switzerland, November 30, 2024--Sensormatic Solutions, the leading global retail solutions portfolio of Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), today shared its first look into in-store shopper traffic for the 2024 holiday season. The brand’s ShopperTrak Analytics insights indicate that U.S. shopper visits were down 3.9% from Nov. 24 through Nov. 29, in line with the in-store traffic trends seen year-to-date (down 3.0% year-over-year).
